name: Unclear Nuclear
description:
A game made for Mini Jam 76: Radiation. The only control is the mouse, which requires only one hand.

Guide Scientists around with the mouse.

  •  Left Click on one to select it.
  • Right Click on it to deselect it.

Uranium Cells are the main obstacle of the game.

  • Don't Stay In Too Long, if a scientist is a radiation field for too long he will die.
  • Turn them off, Turn them on.
    • Switches, only switch on/off if a scientist is near and it is Left Clicked.
    • Pressure Pads, only turn off fields when a scientist is on it.

Get the Scientists Required out of the facility.

Have fun escaping!
